text: Driekes Hoekstra is a folk singer from Breda, Netherlands. On 6 March 2015, he won the finale of the talent show Bloed, Zweet en Tranen ("Blood, Sweat, and Tears") on the Dutch television station SBS6. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Dutch folk singers Category:Reality show winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Driekes Hoekstra
